title: Emotes are only used to be toxic
body:
I'm so sick of emotes and how they are used. I know you can mute them but remembering to mute them every game is impossible.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/29EpZrPW-emotes-feedback-muting-spamming-and-pbe

In this feedback post riot talked about potentially adding an opt out button for emotes permanently and I would like to see this implemented. I have never seen emotes contribute positively to my experience. Nor would I ever use emotes to taunt another player doing poorly.

TL;DR All I want is an OPTION to permanently mute emotes as they don't contribute positively to any of my games.

Having the ability to completely shut them off would be nice, yeah. They're not important for any decision making or shot calling, so might as well just let us permanently silence them. I personally don't have a problem with them, but I can understand why they might be tilting for some players.
